author: Mpost Bureau
title: Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla to pilot SpaceX Dragon to ISS in May
text:
Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla to pilot SpaceX Dragon to ISS in May
Mpost Bureau3 April 2025 3:12 AM IST
Mpost Bureau3 April 2025 3:12 AM IST
New Delhi: Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla will make history as the first Indian astronaut to visit the International Space Station (ISS) when he joins the Axiom Mission 4 (Ax-4) scheduled for May 2025.
The Indian Air Force veteran will serve as mission pilot aboard a SpaceX Dragon spacecraft launching from NASA‚Äôs Kennedy Space Centre in Florida. The mission represents a milestone in India‚Äôs expanding space exploration programme.
‚ÄúEven as an individual travelling to space, this is the journey of 1.4 billion people,‚Äù said Shukla, who is also an astronaut-designate for India‚Äôs Gaganyaan human spaceflight programme.
The 14-day mission will be commanded by former NASA astronaut Peggy Whitson, with Poland‚Äôs Sawosz Uznanski-Wisniewski and Hungary‚Äôs Tibor Kapu as mission specialists.
‚ÄúThis mission demonstrates the growing international nature of space exploration and the important role private missions now play in providing access to low Earth orbit,‚Äù said a NASA spokesperson at Tuesday‚Äôs press conference.
During his stay on the ISS, Shukla plans to conduct scientific experiments and showcase Indian culture through regional artefacts and yoga demonstrations in microgravity.
‚ÄúCaptain Shukla‚Äôs participation builds on our heritage that began with Rakesh Sharma‚Äôs historic flight in 1984,‚Äù noted an ISRO official. ‚ÄúThis represents not just a technical achievement but a cultural milestone for our nation.‚Äù
The mission highlights the expanding collaboration between NASA, Axiom Space, and ISRO, positioning India more prominently in the global space community.with agency inputs

author: Food & Wine
title: Taylor Swift Has a New Favorite Cinnamon Roll ‚Äî and We Have the Recipe
text: News Taylor Swift Has a New Favorite Cinnamon Roll ‚Äî and We Have the Recipe You can bake the buttery cinnamon rolls that are Travis Kelce's must-have dessert at home. By Chandra Ram Chandra Ram Chandra Ram leads the digital food strategy for Food & Wine. She has 15 years experience writing and editing food content and developing recipes. A former restaurant cook and server, she also writes cookbooks. Food & Wine's Editorial Guidelines Updated on January 5, 2024 Trending Videos If you‚Äôre like us, you can‚Äôt help following Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce‚Äôs romance, especially when it involves their love of food. We know Swift is a talented baker who loves to whip up cookies, cakes, and whoopie pies at home. She even inspired a new name for the official state sandwich of New Jersey. Earlier this week, Swift was spotted dining with Brittany Mahomes and a few other wives and girlfriends of Chiefs players at Rye, a favorite spot of Kelce‚Äôs in Leawood, Kansas. As dinner wrapped, she had her new beau top of mind, ordering some of the restaurant‚Äôs famed cinnamon rolls to go. You may remember that only a few weeks ago, Swift was whipping up some pre-game cinnamon rolls for her favorite player. Whole Chickens, Gallons of Milk, and Other Things Donna Kelce Had to Feed Her NFL Star Sons Rye pastry chef and co-owner Megan Garrelts says Kelce regularly orders these rolls whenever he stops into the restaurant, so she wasn‚Äôt surprised when Swift got some to go. Garrelts spent years perfecting these cinnamon rolls, so it‚Äôs no wonder Kelce is such a fan. But if Swift ever gets a craving for these while on the road, Garrelts shared the recipe with Food & Wine back in 2019. Taylor, we‚Äôve got you covered with Garrelts‚Äô original Glazed Cinnamon Rolls with Pecan Swirls recipe. At the restaurant, Garrelts will bake and serve these cinnamon rolls straight from mini cast-iron skillets, but she modified her recipe for F&W so home cooks can bake up a batch without any special equipment. The sweet dough is wrapped around a filling of toasted pecans, cinnamon, brown sugar, and sour cream, then baked and topped with a buttery sugar glaze while still warm. The recipe Garrelts shared with us makes 24 cinnamon rolls; she notes that you can keep unbaked rolls in the freezer for up to a month, and then pull them out for your own pre-game brunch party. Which means you can bake some this weekend, and still have a batch in the freezer, ready for breakfast on Super Bowl Sunday. Each bite is tender, sweet, and full of nutty surprises ‚Äî just like love and football, even if you‚Äôre not dating anyone playing in the game that day. Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why! Other Submit

author: Amaris Encinas
title: What does 12/31/23 mean? The last day of 2023 is an angel number
text:
The upcoming year will be filled with blessings, at least that is what the numerical sequence of this New Year‚Äôs Eve date suggests.
If you take a closer look at the date, written as 12/31/23 or even 123123, you might see an angel number, which are repeating number sequence s, often used as a guide for deeper spiritual exploration. The numerical sequences can range anywhere from 000 to 999 , with each number having a distinct meaning and energy, USA Today previously reported.
The once-in-a-century date, which won‚Äôt be seen again on our calenders until Dec. 31, 2123, marks a new beginning. One, that asks us to ‚Äútransform and evolve with the times and in the right place to embrace what is coming to us,‚Äù according to the Old Farmer‚Äôs Almanac website.
The date has also sparked an online trend, with TikTok users creating videos on the significance of the number and merchandise commemorating the date selling online, including on platforms like Amazon , eBay and Etsy , the Detroit Free Press, part of the USA Today Network reported.
Here‚Äôs what we know about the date.
What does 12/31/23 signify within numerology? Numerology is an ancient esoteric science that deals with numbers and letters and the energy, intention and vibration behind them, professional numerologist Novalee Wilder shared with USA Today earlier this month.
"Before there was even language, there were numbers," she said. "Before we had named things, we had counted them, and we had assigned meaning to that count."
The numbers that make up the angel number are just as important as the whole number, especially when you are trying to determine the vibration and intention behind the number.
Professional astrologer Narayana Mont√∫far told Farmer‚Äôs Almanac that the ‚ÄúNumber 1 brings the very spark of initiation, 2 focuses on building, and 3 is related to the concept of creation. Together, the sequence of these three numbers speaks of the spark of initiation that seeks to build a new creation.‚Äù
If you add all the numbers that make up the date 123123 together, you will come up with 12.
The number 12 in numerology can symbolize spiritual enlightenment, with potential for the day to deliver epiphanies and ‚Äúaha‚Äù moments for individuals and society at large, the website stated.
FYI: How to keep your pets calm during New Year's Eve fireworks
What are some dates to keep in mind in 2024? If you are an angel number enthusiast, there are a few key dates you might want to keep in mind as 2024 rapidly approaches.
A palindrome, not unlike an angel number, is a term typically reserved for words or phrases that are spelled the same way backward as they are forward. Words like level, kayak, civic, and radar are among some of the most common palindromes, according to the Old Farmer‚Äôs Almanac.
Numerical sequences seen in dates or times can also be palindromes, the most well-recognized ones being 3/20/23 or 11:11 , the website stated.
Here are all palindrome dates that will occur in 2024, courtesy of the Farmer‚Äôs Almanac :
4/2/24 4/20/24 4/21/24 4/22/24 4/23/24 4/24/24 4/25/24 4/26/24 4/27/24 4/28/24 4/29/24 Contributing: Olivia Munson, USA Today

author: Notizie, Sport, eventi live
title: Una settimana in pi√π di canicola
text: Al sud delle Alpi il caldo non molla la presa: MeteoSvizzera estende di una settimana (fino a venerd√¨ 9 agosto alle 20) [l‚Äôallerta canicola](https://www.rsi.ch/info/ticino-grigioni-e-insubria/Canicola-pericolo-marcato-fino-al-2-agosto--2216540.html), che rimane a livello marcato (grado 3) nel Sottoceneri e su gran parte del Sopraceneri, sotto i 600 metri di altitudine. Le temperature massime previste potrebbero variare tra i 31 ai 33 gradi, mentre le minime toccheranno i 18. L‚Äôumidit√† osciller√† tra il 40-50%. Le possibili conseguenze del caldo estremo sono il rischio di problemi circolatori e malessere fisico. Le raccomandazioni di comportamento Assumere liquidi a sufficienza (almeno 1,5 litri al giorno), possibilmente non zuccherati. Proteggersi dalla radiazione solare diretta (stare in luoghi ombreggiati, fare uso di un abbigliamento adatto, un copricapo, occhiali da sole e creme solari, ecc.). Arieggiare gli edifici, in particolare di notte e al mattino presto. Evitare gli sforzi fisici o compensare la perdita di sale durante o dopo un‚Äôattivit√† sportiva. Non lasciare persone o animali all‚Äôinterno dell‚Äôauto. Canicola e anziani Il Quotidiano 29.07.2024, 19:00

author: PTI
title: Consequences of putting Donald Trump back in White House extremely serious Kamala Harris - The Week
text:
Chicago, Aug 23 (PTI) Describing her Republican rival Donald Trump as an unserious man, Vice President Kamala Harris, and the Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris on Thursday warned Americans of the consequences of re-electing him for the second term.
 "We know what a second Trump term would look like. It‚Äôs all laid out in 'Project 2025.' ... In many ways, Donald Trump is an unserious man. But the consequences of putting Donald Trump back in the White House are extremely serious‚Ä¶,‚Äô Harris said in the excerpts of the speech released by her campaign ahead of her acceptance speech at the United Center here in Chicago.
 ‚ÄúConsider the power he will have ‚Äî especially after the United States Supreme Court just ruled he would be immune from criminal prosecution," said Harris who is the first Indian-American ever and the first Black woman to be nominated as the presidential candidate of either the Democratic or the Republican parties.
 At the final night of the Democratic National Convention, Congressman Jason Crow laid out how the Project 2025 agenda will jeopardize the safety and security of the American people, give China and Russia a free rein over the allies, and cut critical benefits for the veterans back at home.
 In the excerpts of the speech released by her campaign Harris said, ‚ÄúWe know a strong middle class has always been critical to America‚Äôs success. And building that middle class will be a defining goal of my presidency. This is personal for me. The middle class is where I come from,‚Äù she said.
 "Fellow Americans, I love our country with all my heart. Everywhere I go ‚Äî in everyone I meet ‚Äî I see a nation ready to move forward. Ready for the next step, in the incredible journey that is America,‚Äù she said.
‚ÄúI see an America where we hold fast to the fearless belief that built our nation. That inspired the world. That here, in this country, anything is possible. Nothing is out of reach," Harris said.
